metadata.title: CVE-2023-49937 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SchedMD Slurm 22.05.x, 23.02.x, and 23.11.x.Because of a double free, attackers can cause a denial of service orpossibly execute arbitrary code. The fixed versions are 22.05.11, 23.02.7,and 23.11.1.

criterions.comment: slurm-wlm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
